select * from ( select tc.id,tc.plan,tc.commodity_id,conf.commodityname,conf.price,conf.counts, tc.listing_charge_rate,rownum as row_num from ipo_trusteeship_commodity tc left join ipo_commodity_sale conf on (tc.commodity_id=conf.commodityid) where tc.delete_flag=0
and tc.commodity_id like '%'||#{commodity.commodityId}||'%'
and conf.commodityname like '%'||#{commodity.commodityName}||'%'
and #{endIndex} >=rownum ) where row_num>=#{startIndex}
